text: Bidayat al-Abid is a book on the legal code of the Hanbali school of thought in Sunni Islam, written by the scholar Shaykh Abd al-Rahṃ ān b. ʿAbd Allāh al- Ba ʿli. The author is known for being one of the major scholars of the Hanbali school of thought, known for his precise wording and refinement of his writings. In the book, the author focused mainly on the chapter of worship in the Hanbali school, covering topics such as purification, prayer, funeral rites, zakat, fasting, pilgrimage, and finally, the chapter on jihad.بداية العابد وكفاية الزاهد في الفقه على مذهب الإمام أحمد بن حنبل • الموقع الرسمي للمكتبة الشاملة == References == Category:Islam Category:Islamic theology
